title: Payout functionality is in progress
content: We are starting to implement payout functionality, which allow you to make outgoing payment and do the payment refund from your JaneDoe account. As a first stage now you can see outgoing payments for Bitcoin when you do the withdrawing. When you do the Bitcoin withdrawing you will see 2 outgoing payments. One is actual outgoing payment, another one is a fee for gas with target address 0x0. Besides that we did the payment history table redesign to make less columns.
